system.description:
Starting at 3rd level, you learn additional combat maneuvers from the Tempered Iron tradition at 3rd level, 6th and 11th level. They do not count towards the maximum number of combat maneuvers you know.

3rd level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-maneuvers.Item.e2k7hxnsl3sdrldt]{Purge Magic}

6th level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-maneuvers.Item.z9i2tn37nkn4gr7s]{Gaze Of Conviction}

11th level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-maneuvers.Item.j3asisikt5lga4uj]{Dispelling Assault}
